description: Starting from a list of companies, find all their information on LinkedIn

outputDescription.description: Description of the company on LinkedIn
outputDescription.specialities: List of the company's specialities as listed on LinkedIn
outputDescription.logo: URL of the company logo used on LinkedIn
outputDescription.employeesOnLinkedIn: Number of people that have the company on their LinkedIn profile
outputDescription.salesNavigatorLink: Link to the company insights page if you use Sales Navigator

sessionCookie.label: Session cookie (?)
sessionCookie.placeholder: Paste your LinkedIn session cookie here

helpers: Enter either a Google Spreadsheet URL or a CSV URL (make sure your file is publicly available)
We'll use the first column of your file (column A)
spreadsheetUrl.label: Spreadsheet URL of companies to scrape (?)

companiesPerLaunch.label: Number of lines to process per launch (all if left empty)
